extendedInfo.description: Event Planner is a lightweight application which helps you to organize your events.It provides an easy and enriched interface. You can add events, view events and change status.PLEASE LIKE AND COMMENT.Features of the product:* Birthday Notes* Meeting Notes* Anniversary Notes* Memo* Note* Schedule an event.* Sort Events.Version 3.0 Change Log:===============================1. Menu updated with settings and info.2. Statistics drawer in the main view.3. Events can be grouped based on Title, Type or Date.Version 2.0 Change Log:===============================1. Design updated with Menu.2. New Add Event Dialog and context wise Event parameters.3. Scheduling feature added.4. Scheduling notification added.5. Event details will open as dialog.6. Large screen support.(for Tablets)7. Few minor bug fixes.Version 1.3 Change Log:===============================1. The Square img will act as Checkbox in both the event list and event details page.2. The "Done/Not Done" button is removed from event details page.3. The event type will be displayed along with the title, in event details page.Any queries and comments, please reach out to us creekworm@gmail.com

reviews.title: Bleh!
reviews.comment: This is nothing more than a calendar. Enter dates and times of events. There us ni pkanning involved in this app!
reviews.author: Dawn G
